content.title: College Results
content.quote: Is it possible to predict college loan repayment using the College Scorecard data? What are the indicators of a high repayment rate?

content.title: Divvy Bike Data
content.quote: In 2018 Evanston had over 26,000 unique bike rides. Explore the trends over time with this app built with Shiny and ggplot2 in R.
